Text saved: Stereotypes are simple ideas about a group of people. These ideas are often not true.

People from different cultures can act in different ways. It is good to know about this. This helps us talk to people without problems. But it is very important to remember one thing. We should not use stereotypes. Stereotypes are bad for making good business relationships.

The culture of our country is important. It changes how we act and think. But many other things also change us. For example, the part of the country we are from. Our friends, our age, and our work are also important. The things that happen in our life also change us.

So, we should know that people can be different. But we should not think all people from one country are the same.
Feedback received: Grade 2/10 - FAIL
